title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Mobile Microlearning Course for Historical Causal Reasoning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can analyze primary/secondary causal relationships between historical events with ≥80% accuracy.
Learners can identify three types of linguistic expressions in historical contexts through inquiry-based tasks.
Learners can apply strategies acquired through explicit instruction to analyze work documents at least once.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
